project.description: This job terminates EDGE node (inc NBs and EMRs is exist) and all user environment (AMI, S3, IAM roles and profiles, SGs and subnet)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Service_base_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: unique infrastructure value that previously was used when ssn being provisioned

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SSH_Key_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: name of the uploaded ssh key file (without ".pem")

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Region
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: aws region where infrastructure was deployed

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rand=`openssl rand -hex 10`; sed 's/RID/'${rand}'/g' /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/terminate_edge_node_json/template.json | sed 's/SBN/'${Service_base_name}'/g' | sed 's/EUN/'${Username}'/g' | sed 's/CREG/'${Region}'/g' | sed 's/CKN/'${SSH_Key_Name}'/g' | sudo docker run -i -v /home/ubuntu/keys:/root/keys -v /opt/dlab/tmp/result:/response docker.epmc-bdcc.projects.epam.com/dlab-aws-edge --action $Action ;
